(3)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^M1.0310^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā ^a^T1.0380^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
[03] ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. (2)
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ dukkhāya ^a^V1.0351^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
[03] ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena ^a^T1.0381^ea^ paccayo. (1)
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhāya ^a^M1.0311^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
[03] ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā, maggā vuṭṭhahitvā, phalā vuṭṭhahitvā ^a^T1.0382^ea^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena garuṃ katvā assādeti ^a^V1.0352^ea^ abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. (2)

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ^a^M1.0312^ea^ anulomaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo, anulomaṃ vodānassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodānaṃ maggassa... maggo phalassa... phalaṃ phalassa... anulomaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ cuticittaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ ^a^T1.0383^ea^ vipākamanodhātuyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalākusalaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa vuṭṭhānassa... kiriyaṃ vuṭṭhānassa... phalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] dukkhāya ^a^V1.0353^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ vipākamanodhātuyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena ^a^T1.0384^ea^ paccayo ^a^M1.0313^ea^. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ anulomaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa gotrabhussa anantarapaccayena paccayo. anulomaṃ vodānassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodānaṃ maggassa... maggo phalassa... phalaṃ phalassa... anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā... nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā khandhā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ cuticittaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. āvajjanā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. vipākamanodhātu sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalākusalaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa vuṭṭhānassa... kiriyaṃ vuṭṭhānassa... phalaṃ vuṭṭhānassa... nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] adukkhamasukhāya ^a^T1.0385^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- āvajjanā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 48^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^V1.0354^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarapaccayasadisaṃ).

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ^a^M1.0314^ea^ eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. paṭisandhikkhaṇe sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo -- dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttapaṭisandhi na labbhati.) (1)

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo -- adukkhamasukhāya ^a^T1.0386^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. paṭisandhikkhaṇe adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto eko khandho dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā ekassa khandhassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 52^b^.^eb^ sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo (aññamaññampi nissayampi sahajātapaccayasadisaṃ).

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ sukhāya ^a^V1.0355^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0....^eb^

[03] pakatūpanissayo -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ ^a^M1.0315^ea^ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgaṃ... paññaṃ... rāgaṃ... mohaṃ... mānaṃ... diṭṭhiṃ... patthanaṃ... sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upanissāya sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti (saddhāpañcamakesu ``mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātī''ti kātabbaṃ, avasesesu ^a^T1.0387^ea^ na kātabbaṃ). sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, samphaṃ palapati, sandhiṃ chindati, nillopaṃ harati, ekāgārikaṃ karoti, paripanthe tiṭṭhati, paradāraṃ gacchati, gāmaghātaṃ karoti, nigamaghātaṃ karoti. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā saddhā... sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgo... paññā... rāgo... moho... māno... diṭṭhi... patthanā... sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya saddhāya... sīlassa... sutassa... cāgassa... paññāya... rāgassa... mohassa... mānassa... diṭṭhiyā... patthanāya... sukhasahagatassa kāyaviññāṇassa... sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatūpanissayo^eb^ -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti, pariyiṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgaṃ... paññaṃ upanissāya attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti, pariyiṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ rāgaṃ... mohaṃ... mānaṃ... diṭṭhiṃ... patthanaṃ... sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati. dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati, musā bhaṇati ^a^V1.0356^ea^, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, pharusaṃ bhaṇati, samphaṃ palapati, sandhiṃ chindati, nillopaṃ harati, ekāgārikaṃ karoti, paripanthe ^a^T1.0388^ea^ tiṭṭhati, paradāraṃ gacchati, gāmaghātaṃ karoti, nigamaghātaṃ karoti, mātaraṃ jīvitā voropeti, pitaraṃ jīvitā voropeti, arahantaṃ jīvitā voropeti, duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādeti, saṅghaṃ bhindati. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā saddhā... sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgo... paññā... rāgo... moho... māno... diṭṭhi... patthanā... sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ dosassa... mohassa... dukkhasahagatassa kāyaviññāṇassa... dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sukhāya ^a^M1.0316^ea^ vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0....^eb^

[03] pakatūpanissayo -- sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgaṃ... paññaṃ... rāgaṃ... mohaṃ... mānaṃ... diṭṭhiṃ... patthanaṃ... sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upanissāya adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti. adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati ^a^T1.0389^ea^, musā bhaṇati, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇati, samphaṃ palapati {pharusaṃ bhaṇati, samphaṃ palapati (sī0 syā0)}, sandhiṃ chindati, nillopaṃ harati, ekāgārikaṃ karoti, paripanthe tiṭṭhati, paradāraṃ gacchati, gāmaghātaṃ karoti, nigamaghātaṃ karoti. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā saddhā... sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgo... paññā... rāgo... moho... māno... diṭṭhi... patthanā... sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya saddhāya... sīlassa... sutassa... cāgassa... paññāya... rāgassa... mohassa... mānassa... diṭṭhiyā... patthanāya... adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0....^eb^

[03] pakatūpanissayo ^a^V1.0357^ea^ -- dosaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati, dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati. mohaṃ, dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upanissāya pāṇaṃ hanati, dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati. doso... moho... dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ dosassa... mohassa... dukkhasahagatassa ^a^M1.0317^ea^ kāyaviññāṇassa... dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pakatūpanissayo^eb^ -- dosaṃ ^a^T1.0390^ea^ upanissāya sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti. sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena adinnaṃ ādiyati...pe0... nigamaghātaṃ karoti. mohaṃ, dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upanissāya sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti...pe0... nigamaghātaṃ karoti. doso... moho... dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya saddhāya...pe0... sukhasahagatassa kāyaviññāṇassa sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0....^eb^

[03] pakatūpanissayo -- dosaṃ upanissāya adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti...pe0... nigamaghātaṃ karoti. mohaṃ, dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ upanissāya adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttena cittena dānaṃ deti...pe0... nigamaghātaṃ karoti. doso... moho... dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāya saddhāya...pe0... patthanāya... adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] vipākadhammadhammo ^a^M1.0364^ea^ vipākadhammadhammassa ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca hetupaccayena paccayo -- vipākadhammadhammā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ vipāko dhammo vipākassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0447^ea^ -- vipāke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. (1)

[03] vipāko ^a^V1.0415^ea^ dhammo vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- sekkhā phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, vipāke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti. vipākā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] vipāko dhammo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- arahā phalaṃ paccavekkhati, vipāke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti. vipākā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ vipākadhammadhammo vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti ^a^T1.0448^ea^, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti ^a^M1.0365^ea^, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākadhammadhammacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti. ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanakusalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ākiñcaññāyatanakusalaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. vipākadhammadhammā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] vipākadhammadhammo vipākassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati, kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanavipākassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo ^a^V1.0416^ea^. ākiñcaññāyatanakusalaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] vipākadhammadhammo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- arahā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati. arahā pahīne ^a^T1.0449^ea^ kilese paccavekkhati, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānāti, vipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, cetopariyañāṇena vipākadhammadhammacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti. ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanakiriyassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ākiñcaññāyatanakusalaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. vipākadhammadhammā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- arahā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati. nibbānaṃ āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. arahā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase ^a^M1.0366^ea^... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ... nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti. ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanakiriyassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ākiñcaññāyatanakiriyaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa ^a^T1.0450^ea^, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo vipākassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- nibbānaṃ phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ... nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme ^a^V1.0417^ea^ khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo vipākadhammadhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- sekkhā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. sotaṃ...pe0... nevavipākanavipākadhammadhamme khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti...pe0... dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ ^a^T1.0451^ea^ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti. nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 95^b^.^eb^ vipāko ^a^M1.0367^ea^ dhammo vipākassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- vipākādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] vipāko dhammo vipākadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- sekkhā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vipāke khandhe garuṃ katvā assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. (2)

[03] vipāko ^a^V1.0418^ea^ dhammo nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- arahā phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- vipākādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] vipāko dhammo vipākassa ca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammassa ca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- vipākādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ vipākadhammadhammo vipākadhammadhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati ^a^T1.0452^ea^, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, sekkhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, vipākadhammadhamme khandhe garuṃ katvā assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati,. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- vipākadhammadhammādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] upādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- upādinnupādāniyā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- upādinnupādāniyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anupādinnupādāniyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anupādinnānupādāniyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ ^a^T1.0500^ea^ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anupādinnānupādāniyā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo ^a^V1.0467^ea^ dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnānupādāniyassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anupādinnānupādāniyā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo ^a^M1.0408^ea^ dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... upādinnupādāniye rūpe... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ... upādinnupādāniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vippassanti, assādenti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. upādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... upādinnupādāniyaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ... rasāyatanaṃ... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ^a^T1.0501^ea^ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... upādinnupādāniye rūpe... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ... upādinnupādāniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā upādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpaṃ passati, cetopariyañāṇena upādinnupādāniyacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti. upādinnupādāniyā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni ^a^V1.0468^ea^ paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti; anupādinnupādāniye rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... anupādinnupādāniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato ^a^M1.0409^ea^ vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā anupādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpaṃ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā ^a^T1.0502^ea^ saddaṃ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena anupādinnupādāniyacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti. ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. anupādinnupādāniyā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā anupādinnupādāniye rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... anupādinnupādāniye khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. ākāsānañcāyatanakusalaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanavipākassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ākiñcaññāyatanakusalaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. anupādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 54^b^.^eb^ anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- nibbānaṃ maggassa, phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena ^a^T1.0503^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. ariyā cetopariyañāṇena anupādinnānupādāniyacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti; anupādinnānupādāniyā ^a^V1.0469^ea^ khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo ^a^M1.0410^ea^ dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... upādinnupādāniye rūpe... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ... upādinnupādāniye khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati; taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. (1)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati; jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati; sekkhā gotrabhuṃ garuṃ ^a^T1.0504^ea^ katvā paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. anupādinnupādāniye rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... anupādinnupādāniye khandhe garuṃ katvā assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniyādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- nibbānaṃ maggassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati. ^b^ārammaṇādhipati^eb^ -- ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ ^a^V1.0470^ea^ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti. nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyādhipati cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo ^a^M1.0411^ea^ dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnānupādāniyassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo ^a^T1.0505^ea^. ^b^sahajātādhipati^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimā purimā upādinnupādāniyā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ upādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo; pañcaviññāṇaṃ vipākamanodhātuyā anantarapaccayena paccayo; vipākamanodhātu vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] 61^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa...pe0... utu kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa...pe0... bhojanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa...pe0... kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ... kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utu... bhojanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] upādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ ^a^T1.0512^ea^ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti, pāṇaṃ hanati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati. kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utuṃ... bhojanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati. kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ... kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utu... bhojanaṃ anupādinnupādāniyāya ^a^M1.0416^ea^ saddhāya... sīlassa... sutassa... cāgassa... paññāya... rāgassa... dosassa... mohassa... mānassa... diṭṭhiyā... patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo ^a^V1.0476^ea^ dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pakatūpanissayo^eb^ -- kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ upanissāya maggaṃ uppādeti, phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utuṃ... bhojanaṃ upanissāya maggaṃ uppādeti, phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ... kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ... utu... bhojanaṃ maggassa... phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- anupādinnupādāniyaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti. anupādinnupādāniyaṃ sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgaṃ... paññaṃ... rāgaṃ... dosaṃ... mohaṃ... mānaṃ ^a^T1.0513^ea^... diṭṭhiṃ... patthanaṃ... utuṃ... bhojanaṃ... senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti...pe0... samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, pāṇaṃ hanati...pe0... saṅghaṃ bhindati. anupādinnupādāniyā saddhā... sīlaṃ... sutaṃ... cāgo... paññā... rāgo... doso... moho... māno... diṭṭhi... patthanā... utu... bhojanaṃ... senāsanaṃ... anupādinnupādāniyāya saddhāya... sīlassa... sutassa... cāgassa... paññāya... rāgassa... dosassa... mohassa... mānassa... diṭṭhiyā... patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa...pe0... paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dutiyassa...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa...pe0... pāṇātipāto pāṇātipātassa...pe0... niyatamicchādiṭṭhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā...pe0.... (1)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- anupādinnupādāniyaṃ saddhaṃ upanissāya attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti, pariyiṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti. anupādinnupādāniyaṃ sīlaṃ ^a^M1.0417^ea^...pe0... senāsanaṃ upanissāya attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti, pariyiṭṭhimūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ paccanubhoti. anupādinnupādāniyā saddhā...pe0... senāsanaṃ kāyikassa sukhassa ^a^V1.0477^ea^, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo ^a^T1.0514^ea^ dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. dutiyassa maggassa...pe0... tatiyassa maggassa...pe0... catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa...pe0... tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa...pe0... maggo phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūnissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatūpanissayo -- ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ samāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato ^a^T1.0515^ea^ dukkhato anattato vipassanti. maggo ariyānaṃ atthappaṭisambhidāya dhammappaṭisambhidāya niruttippaṭisambhidāya paṭibhānappaṭisambhidāya ṭhānāṭhānakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo ^a^V1.0478^ea^ ^a^M1.0418^ea^ dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati; kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... upādinnupādāniye rūpe... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. upādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... upādinnupādāniyaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ... rasāyatanaṃ... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu upādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo -- ārammaṇapurejātaṃ, vatthupurejātaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapurejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti ^a^T1.0516^ea^ abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. sotaṃ...pe0... vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā upādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpaṃ passanti. ^b^vatthupurejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu anupādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. [03] 82^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo ^a^T1.0533^ea^ dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- upādinnupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe upādinnupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. khandhā vatthussa...pe0... vatthu khandhānaṃ...pe0... ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... mahābhūtā kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0... mahābhūtā kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... upādinnupādāniye rūpe... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. upādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... upādinnupādāniyaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ... rasāyatanaṃ... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... kāyāyatanaṃ ^a^T1.0534^ea^ kāyaviññāṇassa...pe0... vatthu upādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.

[03] ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- upādinnupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa ^a^V1.0492^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo. upādinnupādāniyo ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^rūpajīvitindriyaṃ^eb^ kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo ^a^M1.0431^ea^ dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- upādinnupādāniyā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... upādinnupādāniye rūpe... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā upādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpaṃ passati. vatthu anupādinnupādāniyaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- upādinnupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. upādinnupādāniyo ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] upādinnupādāniyo ^a^T1.0535^ea^ dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- vatthu anupādinnānupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- upādinnupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- upādinnupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. upādinnupādāniyo ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. ^b^sahajāto^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniyo eko khandho ^a^V1.0493^ea^ tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ ^a^M1.0432^ea^...pe0... mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. bāhiraṃ... āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ ^a^T1.0536^ea^... utusamuṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ...pe0.... ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniye rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunā anupādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpaṃ passati. dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. anupādinnupādāniyo ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniye rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati; taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati. kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. anupādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. anupādinnupādāniyo ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ^a^T1.0537^ea^ ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. anupādinnupādāniyo ^b^kabaḷīkāro āhāro^eb^ upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^V1.0494^ea^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ ^a^M1.0433^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. ^b^sahajātā^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa ca ^a^T1.0538^ea^ anupādinnānupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ^eb^. sahajāto -- anupādinnānupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo anupādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnānupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ. sahajāto^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. sahajāto -- anupādinnānupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātassa imassa anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa purejātassa imassa anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā ^a^V1.0495^ea^ dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ ^a^M1.0434^ea^ purejātassa imassa anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (5)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa ca ^a^T1.0539^ea^ anupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchājātā^eb^ -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (6)

[03] anupādinnānupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnānupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ^eb^. sahajāto -- anupādinnānupādāniyo eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhā ekassa khandhassa purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātassa imassa upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (7)

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^pacchājātaṃ, indriyaṃ^eb^. pacchājātā -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā anupādinnānupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ^eb^ ^a^T1.0540^ea^. sahajāto -- anupādinnānupādāniyo eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. tayo khandhā ca vatthu ca ekassa khandhassa atthipaccayena paccayo. dve khandhā ca vatthu ca dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ^eb^. pacchājātā -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā ^a^V1.0496^ea^ ca anupādinnupādāniyo kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo ^a^M1.0435^ea^ ca anupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ^eb^. sahajātā -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchājātā -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā ca anupādinnupādāniyo kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anupādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ^eb^. pacchājātā -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā ca anupādinnupādāniyo kabaḷīkāro āhāro ^a^T1.0541^ea^ ca upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^purejātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ^eb^. purejātaṃ -- anupādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanañca cakkhāyatanañca cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... anupādinnupādāniyaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca kāyāyatanañca kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo. anupādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca upādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... anupādinnupādāniyaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca upādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchājātā -- upādinnupādāniyā khandhā ca anupādinnupādāniyo kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnupādāniyo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro upādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchājātā -- anupādinnupādāniyā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā anupādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ, ^b^pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ. sahajātā^eb^ -- upādinnupādāniyā ^a^V1.0497^ea^ khandhā ca ^a^T1.0542^ea^ mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejātaṃ^eb^ -- anupādinnupādāniyaṃ rūpāyatanañca vatthu ca anupādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ...pe0... anupādinnupādāniyaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca vatthu ca anupādinnupādāniyānaṃ khandhānaṃ ^a^M1.0436^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchājātā -- upādinnupādāniyā khandhā ca anupādinnupādāniyo kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnupādāniyo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro anupādinnupādāniyassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnupādāniyo ca dhammā upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo... ^b^āhāraṃ...^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnupādāniyo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro upādinnupādāniyassa ca anupādinnupādāniyassa ca kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] upādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnupādāniyo ca anupādinnānupādāniyo ca dhammā upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ^eb^. pacchājātā -- anupādinnānupādāniyā khandhā ca anupādinnānupādāniyo kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 87^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ^a^T1.0543^ea^ natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (saṃkhittaṃ.)

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ hetuyā ^a^V1.0498^ea^ satta, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye ekādasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte satta, pacchājāte nava, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke cha, āhāre dvādasa, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte dasa, atthiyā tevīsa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate tevīsa.

[03] hetupaccayā ^a^M1.0437^ea^ adhipatiyā cattāri, sahajāte satta, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye satta, vipāke cha, indriye satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte cattāri, atthiyā satta, avigate satta (saṃkhittaṃ).
[01] (yathā kusalattikassa gaṇanā sajjhāyamaggena gaṇitā, evaṃ gaṇetabbā. kusalattikassa gaṇanato upādinnattike gaṇanā gambhīrā sukhumatarā ca, evaṃ kātūna asammohantena gaṇetabbaṃ.)
[06] anulomaṃ.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ upādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena ^a^T1.0544^ea^ paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo ^a^V1.0499^ea^... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. [03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti; sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, kusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati; saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe assādenti abhinandanti...pe0... domanassaṃ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjati. saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo -- dānaṃ datvā, sīlaṃ samādiyitvā ^a^T1.0554^ea^, uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati; jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā gotrabhuṃ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṃ paccavekkhanti, cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti ^a^V1.0510^ea^; sotaṃ... ghānaṃ... jivhaṃ... kāyaṃ... rūpe... sadde... gandhe... rase... phoṭṭhabbe... vatthuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesike khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti; dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passanti, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇanti, cetopariyañāṇena asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti. ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa...pe0... ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo...pe0... phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa ^a^M1.0447^ea^, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ^a^V1.0526^ea^ dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (4)

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... āhārapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ^a^M1.0462^ea^ dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ^a^T1.0575^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo... sahajātapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. (1)
[03] asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ^a^V1.0527^ea^ ca asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhāsaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. (2)
[03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. (1)
[03] saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. (2)

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ nahetuyā ^a^T1.0576^ea^ cuddasa, nāarammaṇe cuddasa, nādhipatiyā cuddasa, nānantare cuddasa, nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, nāññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, nāasevane cuddasa, nakamme cuddasa, navipāke cuddasa ^a^M1.0463^ea^, nāahāre cuddasa, naindriye cuddasa, najhāne cuddasa, namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
[06] nahetupaccayā nāarammaṇe cuddasa (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[06] (yathā kusalattike paccanīyagaṇanā, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
[06] paccanīyaṃ.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayā ^a^V1.0528^ea^ nāarammaṇe satta, nādhipatiyā satta, nānantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nāññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta, nāasevane satta, nakamme satta, navipāke satta, nāahāre satta, naindriye satta, najhāne satta, namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
[03] hetu-sahajāta-nissaya-atthi-avigatanti nāarammaṇe satta...pe0... nāññamaññe tīṇi...pe0... nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi...pe0... novigate satta (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] (yathā kusalattike anulomapaccanīyagaṇanā vibhattā, evaṃ vibhajitabbaṃ.)
[06] anulomapaccanīyaṃ.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayā ^a^M1.0464^ea^ ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā aṭṭha, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi ^a^T1.0577^ea^, kamme satta, vipāke cattāri, āhāre satta, indriye satta, jhāne satta, magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate terasa.
[03] nahetupaccayā ^a^V1.0529^ea^ nāarammaṇapaccayā adhipatiyā satta (saṃkhittaṃ.)
[03] (yathā kusalattike paccanīyānulomagaṇanā vibhattā, evaṃ vibhajitabbaṃ.)
[06] paccanīyānulomaṃ.
[06] saṃkiliṭṭhattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[06] paṭṭhānapāḷi paṭhamo bhāgo niṭṭhito.
